column5: I want to say a BIG thank you to our most generous member on this board. He never seems to amaze so many members here. If the world had more gentle giants like this guy, it would be such a better world . BIG CLIFF dropped off a package to my door this past weekend while I was at work. It was more then I thought and very much appreciative for his generosity.Â  I have not tied many buck tails, but these will be getting me on another new path of tieing. Thank you so much SIR. Yer a hell of a great man. Very sorry I could not be there in person to receive them .
Looks great. Now get to work.
I was thinking of you right away. ðŸ˜†
They were gifted to me and I had way more than I could use.Â  I couldn't think of any one that could make better use of them. I'm looking forward to seeing some of your creations.
You have tail for the rest of your life!
Cliff sure does get around, solid dude he is.
